BackstoryDef.title: acolyte
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} can no longer remember {PAWN_possessive} childhood. It matters not. {PAWN_nameDef} became a justiciar - that is all that matters.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: dark justiciar
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} stirred from death. The Dark God blessed {PAWN_nameDef} with the chance to continue {PAWN_possessive} service, and {PAWN_pronoun} does so willingly.
